p.s: Starr gets back to the street where Khalil's murder happened.
She is there the first time after the incident.
There is a crowd of Just Us for Justice protestors gathered who are repeadeatlyrepeatedly saying that a hairbrush is not a gun.
As Starr looks around she remembers the death, she sees Khalil as he would lie on the street and remembers exactly what happened.
She spots Ms. Ofrah and shortly later she comes up to Starr and talks with her.
StarrsStarr's comparisons are already taking part of the a hairbrush is not a gun protest.

Starr says she wants to do something and is tired of doing small things Starr gets handed a bullhorn and speaks about Khalil whilte standing on a police car with the officer complaining that she should get off.
But she talkestalks to him and everybody through the bullhorn.
